title: how to get out of bronze
body: what do i do to get out of bronze please help

replies.body:
Simplest ways to improve:
- Play safe/don't die.
- Kill as many minions as possible (counter jungle if you're ahead).
- When you fail a kill or die, think about how you could have played the scenario differently.
- Play champions you are best with.

If all else fails:
- Play broken champions.
- Split push the entire game.

- split push the entire game
once i pushed 7 towers all by myself and lost cuz my botlane fed too hard, btw, is anyone better at splitpush than {{champion:83}}

{{champion:23}} and lategame {{champion:24}}  not only do these guys push down towers like a hurricane mowing through a house of cards, but if you don't send 2 or 3 people to stop them, the people you send to stop the splitpush will often get mulched and you'll still lose the inhibitor.
wtf did someone downvote you lol, and yeah your right

I win win win to b2, then lose lose lose to b4, then back again. This is my cycle.

Between the feeders (sometimes me, ill own it), the afks, the dc's and the laggers, it definitely feels as though the universe hates you.
Just watch qtpie he will shit talk bronze and make u think ur complete garbage and then u will eventually get out

Im gold in soloq but i cant carry bronze 5 in flex. i honestly have no idea how i got out the first time! you find the secret let me know, coz i cant carry them, i cant support them and nobody listens so its like 1v5 anyway

it is 50/50 to get out of bronze if u not super good. 
Reason 1: intentional feeder in bronze is many 
Reason 2: player who think they strong enough to 1v5 (think they are the carry) 
Reason 3: blind player who never look map 

this is my experience to get out bronze, its all 50/50 if ur skill is average in this rank. Riot said win lane win game this logic is a lie in bronze.
dont forget about the80% uber non int mid feeders
Main {{champion:122}}  top and dunk bronze idiots
strange, i play anivia and pop bronze idiots, 90% of games i dont get mid, my mid feeds

What do you think is holding you back? 

It can be quite difficult and repetitive to give a generic response, and it would be much more valuable to you if you could pinpoint a couple of things for us to help you with. 

In the meantime, check out these resources to help you gain perspective / brush up on macro and micro play. 

* [leaguecraft 101](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=iko2tqmDpJQ)
* [Not dying as much ](https://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/gameplay-strategy/tBNPdREA-10-tips-to-reduce-your-death-count)
* [Attitude](https://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/gameplay-strategy/E5KPW5Qx-playing-like-a-god-but-still-cant-climb-part-1)

There are so many guides out there to tell you how to get out of bronze. Just do a quick youtube search and you will find Hundreds of videos. 
Here's a video right here to get u started https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ldRkl9GcmFQ
Do nothing, quit league, play another game, it's near impossible
